transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan boliye sir.
Customer: Ji Pravesh ji good morning.
Executive: Good morning bataiye.
Customer: Haan ji sir, kal aapki meri shayad senior super senior se baat hui hogi jo branch manager hai Naveen sir unse to baat hui hogi aapki.
Customer: Haan hui thi.
Executive: Haan to sir dekhiye unhone hame jo suggestion diya ki ek group banaya jitni bhi lead jaise kal aapne jo mujhe personally bheja tha maine unko na matlab unke paas bagal mein baith ke maine har ek lead ka unko maine proper dikhaya ki kya chal raha hai kya nahi chal raha hai theek hai is usi ke baad
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Unhone bola theek hai Ranjit main baat karta hu sir se theek hai to fir unhone usi cheez mein aapse jo bhi discussion kiya and I think aapko jo bhi discussion hua jo bhi aapka unka discussion hua to uske baad humne ek aapke liye group bana diya sir jisme ki main hu Shubham sir hai and aap bhi hai correct theek hai to usme aaj se jo bhi matlab ki aapne jo mujhse bola ki aap har ek bylead ka aap mujhe bataoge jo bhi hoga x y z jaise ki aapka abhi main
Customer: Bilkul bilkul dunga.
Executive: Haan to wo cheez aap mujhe usi group mein per lead aap mujhe proper tarike se dete jaiega har ek cheez theek hai.
Customer: Sun bol deta hu bas abhi na main bank ja raha hu pehle bank walon ke aise taise karne hai kyuki mera wo account unfreeze nahi hua na abhi tak kal unhone sham 6 baje ka wada kiya tha.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: To aaj Chetan mam to aayi nahi hai but main continue follow up lega office se hi seedha pahunch raha hu bank. Nahi nahi theek hai theek hai.
Executive: Bank se seedha aa raha hu office.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai aap aaram se jaiega sir theek hai maine isiliye aapko call kiya aisa na ho ki kal aapse pura discussion hua fir aaj main bhul jaunga wo cheez nahi hoga theek hai isiliye maine haan.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Bhulne wali cheez hi nahi hai wo to ab usko apne handle mein liya hai to apne aapne hisab se handle karunga. Correct correct correct correct aur aisa bhi nahi hai ki jahan par main bhi aapko kuch bhi karunga but haan kal jo bhi hamari discussion hui bylead mein har ek cheez aur aaj humne jo bhi aapke liye kiya hai uske liye aap mujhe dijiyega feedback aap a jao bank se and bas ek aapse request hai sir ki kal aapne jo customer care mein call kiya tha mera phone busy aa raha tha uske regarding aapne customer care mein call kiya tha uska ticket khula hua hai sir usko main close kar raha hu aapke paas ek feedback aayega.
Executive: Bilkul main deta hu.
Customer: Please usme mere liye feedback jaega sir theek hai to agar matlab ki aap mere servicing se satisfied ho to please satisfied jarur kijiyega sir kyuki wo mere performance mein nahi aata hai.
Executive: Koi issue nahi hai wo koi issue nahi hai sir mere liye sari cheeze aapko pata hai mera aisa feature aisa kaam nahi hai but cheezon ko leke aap hi samjhe ki jab main phone kar raha hu ya koi aisa wo jo Shubham sir hai na unhone jo word bole na mere ko bilkul acche nahi lage.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Saamne se banda paisa invest kar raha hai 5 lakh rupaye rakam hoti hai mazak nahi hai samajh mein aaya kya 100% wo to wo to aisa samajh raha hai ki hum log.
Customer: Haan ho sakta hai unki 5 lakh rupaye mahine phelte ho isliye unko lag raha hoga ki bahut chhoti cheez hai 5 lakh rupaye theek hai.
Executive: Nahi sir dekhiye dekhiye aapko main ek cheez batau sir mera aur aapka alag hai theek hai agar aap jis tarah hum log apni servicing ko handle karte hai jaise aap mujhe bhejo.
Customer: Wo na ki bylead to hum de rahe hai hame kya karna deal ho na ho ye kya matlab thodi hota hai.
Executive: Sahi sir.
Customer: Nahi pategi usme aapki galti nahi hai usme meri galti hai lekin aap ye bolo nahi deal deal se hame kya karna deal se kyu nahi karna bhai jab genuine customer hoga tab deal hogi kyu nahi hogi.
Executive: Obvious si baat hai jaise.
Customer: Wahi wahi wahi maine wahi maine example diya tha unko maine aap batao aapka 1.5 lakh ka plan 50000 mein lu kya aap de doge aap mujhe genuine customer samjhoge yahi to kahoge mazak kar raha hai ye customer nahi ho sakta.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Are maine aapne 5.5 lakh ka plan agar 5 mein liya to chalo theek hai aapne de diya main wahi 3 lakh bolta aur aap 6 pe hote fir aagle baar mere paas kitne tak aa sakte the 5 tak aa sakte the jyada se jyada kya mujhe 3.5 lakh mein 3 lakh mein deal sell karte nahi karte.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Mana hi to karte ye kehte ki mazak ye kar raha hai banda plan thodi banega ye hmm one year ka agar main aapko 5 6 lakh rupaye de raha hu to aap chhoti si cheez man samjho us cheez ko kahin na kahin aapke liye chhoti cheez ho sakti hai ho sakta hai aapke 50 lakh wale plan sell hota hai wo alag cheez hai lekin mere liye wo badi cheez hai.
Executive: Sahi sir wo possible hi nahi hota sir wo to sir dekho koi agar hamara 1.5 lakh rupaye ka bhi package leta hai to hum usko waise hi servicing dete hai haan chaliye baat karne ka.
Customer: Aap bhi de gaya na 5 lakh rupaye bahut badi cheez hui hai fir humne maange lagta hai yaar do do mahine mere ko matlab mere ko 20000 rupaye earning nahi hui main 5 lakh rupaye invest karke baitha hu usse mere ko interest nahi nikal raha to fir mera kya fayda kya agar main usko account mein agar fix deposit kar deta to bhi mere ko interest to milta hi na kuch aur mera paisa safe tha ki chalo theek hai mera paisa mere paas kya tha ek wo rakha unne har tarike se sure tha ki mere paas 5 lakh rupaye emergency mein pada hua hai hai na 5 lakh rupaye bhi chala gaya aur badle mein interest return nahi aa rahi hai to main kya karunga bataiye plan ja.
Customer: To main complaint nahi karu to kya nahi karu.
Executive: Nahi nahi are sir main khud bol raha hu ki frustration aayega gussa aayega main samajh gaya sir lekin wahi cheez hota hai na sir ki.
Customer: Gussa aane se matlab nahi hai uska solution nikalna chahiye bas.
Executive: Haan wo cheez to main jaan raha hu sir solution ke liye tabhi to humne group banaya aur har ek cheez ke liye hum log khud aap proper tarike se le rahe hai har ek lead ka bhi le rahe hai aur aage bhi dikha rahe hai ki kaisa kaisa lead aa raha hai aur khud agar jahan par help ho raha hai sir khud bhi call kar rahe hai aapke samne main kal call pe liya hu mujhe koi dikkat nahi hai.
Customer: Bilkul main aapko system se bilkul system se juda hua baitha hu mere ko bilkul karna hi hai mere ko bhi karna hi hai aisa nahi hai.
Customer: Ab baki abhi main phone rakhta hu wapas matlab bank pahunch ke ek baar fir aapko please dunga aur wo unfreeze hota hai kya hota hai.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai aap aap mujhe aap jaiega bank aaram se aap bank jaiega bank se wapas aake mujhe ek baar call kijiyega theek hai fir se hum aaj se wo proper tarike se har ek lead mein kaam karte hai and bas wahi mera ek request tha ki ek feedback form aayega to usme please satisfied kijiyega sir.
Customer: Main kar dunga lekin meri cheezon ko aap proper tarike se answer karenge please.
Executive: Sir abhi request hi kar raha hu.
Customer: Nahi sir proper tarike se hi answer karunga sir jo bhi cheez hai uska main proper tarike se answer hi karunga haan ek cheez hota hai na sir ki aap jaise ki aap abhi main aapke sath call mein hu agar mera bhi koi dusra client call kar raha hoga theek hai aur important hoga.
Customer: Sir aapka call aayega mujhe jayega mere ko samajh aayega issue nahi hai.
Executive: Haan.
Executive: Theek hai sir main ye close kar raha hu please aap usme satisfied kar dijiyega aur aap office pahunch ke mujhe turant call kijiye theek hai office pahunch ke.
Customer: Theek hai main bhejta aapko bhejta hu na.
Executive: Theek.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's account is not yet unfrozen.

- Dissatisfied with Shubham Sir's words.

- Feels 5 lakh investment is not valued.

- Frustrated with lack of returns on investment.



Resolution:

- Executive created a group for better communication.

- Executive assured proper handling of leads.

- Executive requested positive feedback on the ticket.

- Executive assured proper answers to concerns.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call after reaching the bank.



Alert (If Any):

complaint

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- account, unfreeze, feedback, byleads, investment
